name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

description: A pirate crew led by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, based on the massive ship Thriller Bark in the Florian Triangle. The crew specializes in creating zombie soldiers from corpses and stolen shadows.

keyMoments.title: Loss of Special Zombie Ryuma
keyMoments.description: The Thriller Bark Pirates lose one of their most powerful zombies when Ryuma is defeated by Zoro and his body disintegrates.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a significant loss to Gecko Moria's zombie army and weakens the crew's fighting force.

statusHistory.reason: Crew remains operational during this episode despite losses

historicalSignificance: One of the crews led by a Warlord of the Sea, known for their unique zombie creation abilities using the Kage Kage no Mi powers.
